text: Also, <@U69BL50BF> in case you're interested, Rodas4P is now >10x faster than Euler on my heat conduction + phase change problem after providing a tridiagonal Jacobian prototype :slightly_smiling_face: :partying_face:

elements.text: in case you're interested, Rodas4P is now >10x faster than Euler on my heat conduction + phase change problem after providing a tridiagonal Jacobian prototype

text: It's why we have so much sparsity detection stuff now.

elements.text: It's why we have so much sparsity detection stuff now.

text: And it's super cool that all you have to do is change the type to the specialized matrix type and everything just magically gets faster. I'm glad I'm using Julia!

elements.text: And it's super cool that all you have to do is change the type to the specialized matrix type and everything just magically gets faster. I'm glad I'm using Julia!
